name: Escape Plan (2017)
description:
This is my first released game. It is built using Unreal Engine 4.
Right now there are 2 finished levels (that need some kind of polishing), and a semi-finished level, so the duration of the game is very small.
I lost interest in making this as I have virtually no feedback from others so I'm releasing it here. If you like it and you want to support me, make a donation or post your feedback (negative feedback is welcome but be polite) and I'll be making more levels!
The minimum price is $1. Pay what you want. The recommended price is $5, around a cup of coffee or two, but feel free to pay more (or less, no problem there!)
The game is using the default Unreal Engine 4 Assets, as I'm no artist.
Currently there is no audio, just some sounds for doors etc.
System Requirements:
RAM: 2GBHDD: 450MBOS: Windows 7 and newerGPU: DirectX 11 capable card with 512MB VRAM and SM4.0 support.Mouse & Keyboard (obviously)
